participant_1.background:
I love to make tasty carrot soup in my spare time.
i love comic books.
i prefer winter over fall.
I would like to learn how to train my dogs to behave better.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat the skin of the apple, but my family is not fond of it.
i like to build things.
my favorite band is the avert brother.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.

content.text: Hey, I am doing well! I'm just finishing up a bowl of carrot soup. What are you up to?
Hey there! I just finished eating an apple. I like to eat the skin, but my family does not. How do you like your apples?
I eat them with skin too! I like the extra crunch and flavor. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to build things. I just finished building a bird house for my backyard. I also like to make short films and share them with my friends.
That's awesome! I love to watch short films. What's your favorite film you've made?
I don't have a favorite, but I really like the one I made about my dog. It's a comedy about how he gets into all sorts of trouble.
That sounds funny! I would love to see it.
Sure, I'll send you a link. What else are you into?
I like to read comic books. I'm really into Marvel right now. I also love winter. It's the perfect time to curl up with a good book and a hot cup of soup.
I love Marvel too! I'm really excited for the new Avengers movie. I also love winter. It's the perfect time to go skiing or snowboarding.
That's true. I've never been skiing or snowboarding before, but I've always wanted to try.
You should! It's a lot of fun. I've been skiing since I was a kid
